recommended_degree: Manajemen Transportasi, Manajemen Transportasi Jalan, Manajemen Bisnis, Teknik Transportasi Laut, Manajemen Pelabuhan Dan Logistik Maritim (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description: Coordinating delivery schedules, monitoring fleet activities, preparing transportation-related documents, and maintaining accurate logistics data. The role also includes supporting route planning, tracking shipment status, and handling daily administrative tasks to ensure smooth transportation operations.
